column5: Taking my 13 and 10 yr olds to Williams lake lodge last week of July. I know there are numbers there, but want to target larger eyes! Any pointers? I know that crawlers produce and there are fish everywhere but want to find a hog! Any pointers on locations or presentations are appreciated. Boys are pumped for first trip. Me too! Be safe everyone
20' to 35' FOW, big 4" sucker minnow, 3/8 oz chartreuse jig
PM me if you need some spots.........

When you come out of Williams Bay go left towards McIntyre Bay. There are lot of good spots around the islands and near the entrance to McIntyre. Fish jig/minnow and fish slow. Look for drop offs, humps ,long points and fish the windy sides. Might also do some bottom bouncing with crawlers to help locate fish. Good Luck, Mike Kansas
